item.title: Playcar
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> A guide to robotics Comfy Projects Playcar RC cars are fun but hard to build. Not this one! Your browser does not support the video tag. Components Here are some components you need for this project. Most of these can be used for multiple projects! Raspberry Pi Zero 2W Small but mighty. Packed with plenty computing power, this bad boy controls are of the motor operations. Quantity 1 Price 15$ LM2596 Buck Converter Regulates voltage from the AA batteries to power the Raspberry Pi Quantity 1 Price 5$ DC Motor This is the horsepower for Playcar.
